task.title: Verify Pickup Grounding and Connection
task.shortdesc: Confirm that pickup wires are correctly connected according to the manufacturer's wiring code.

prereq.p: You need the manufacturer's wiring diagram for your specific pickup model.

context.p: Incorrect wire colors or improperly joined coil leads can cause weak or no sound. Verify your connections match the manufacturer's specifications.

step.cmd: Compare your pickup wiring to the manufacturer's wiring diagram.
step.info: Verify that hot and ground wires match the color codes shown in the diagram.

step.cmd: Inspect the series link wires to ensure they are properly joined and insulated with electrical tape.
step.info: Series link wires are the coil leads you soldered together to create the series connection.

result.p: The pickup is now properly grounded and connected.
